entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
